draw_surface_general.htm+html.head.title: draw_surface_general.htm+html.body.p:168-3
draw_surface_general: This will draw a 32x32 pixel area from 8x8 pixels into the surface. It will be stretched to double its usual width but half its usual height. It will be opaque, and upside down. The top area of the surface will be blended white and hence normal, but the bottom area will be black, meaning the surface will go from normal to silhouette downwards in a smooth gradient.
